Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Malfunction reported by flight crew.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Age-related degradation of elastomeric components
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Electronic Warfare component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 29/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
